name: Reach the Star - In one line
name_original: Reach the Star - In one line
description:
Focus on solving challenging puzzles in the relaxing antistress universe of Reach the Star.
Can you get to the star in one line before the steps run out?

Use brainly ways and various tiles to get to the star. In Reach the Star you challenge your brain with dozens of puzzles, while simultaneously relaxing your mind with its serene atmosphere.

Time to take a break and focus on reaching the star!

Features:
• Relaxing ambience
• Unique design
• Multiple worlds
• Dozens of levels for each world
• Collect orbs to unlock new worlds
• And even more levels coming soon!


Enjoy the soothing atmosphere of Reach the Star.

#reachthestar
